'''Chiseled red sandstone''' is the chiseled variant of [[red sandstone]], crafted from [[red sandstone slab]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Chiseled red sandstone can be mined with any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, the [[block]] drops nothing.
{{breaking row
|horizontal=1
|Chiseled Red Sandstone
|Pickaxe

}}

== Usage ==
Unlike [[red sand]], chiseled red sandstone is never affected by [[gravity]].

Chiseled red sandstone has a [[Wither]] figure.

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage|Chiseled Red Sandstone}}

=== Note blocks ===
Chiseled red sandstone can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
